body:
Comment 39: 
The traceback will print the first 5 words.  You can get more context by changing the 4
in "if(i >= 4) {" around line 118 in traceback_x86.c to a larger value.  I think it
couldn't hurt to print up to 8 arguments.  That might be a worthwhile change.

Addr looks like an interface so 0x1 does look a little bit strange.  Seeing the
remaining argument words would be helpful.
